channel.title: Trance Station - DJ Eclypse
channel.description:
Bringing you the most incredible and technically designed trance, progressive, and breakbeat theme based DJ mixes in the galaxy!
Follow on facebook @ http://facebook.com/djeclypseusa
channel.itunes:subtitle: Engineered Trance DJ Mixes
channel.itunes:author: DJ Eclypse
channel.itunes:summary:
Bringing you the most incredible and technically designed trance, progressive, and breakbeat theme based DJ mixes in the galaxy!
Follow on facebook @ http://facebook.com/djeclypseusa

item.title: Peak XV
item.description: [PROGRESSIVE/EPIC TRANCE] Peak XV (the designation given by surveyors in the 1800's to what is now known as Mt. Everest), a mix inspired by the tallest point on earth, will take you on a journey from base camp to the pinnacle of the world in just under 80 minutes. With plenty of action to go around, expect blends between agressive and melodic trance leading to some serious anthems to finish off the set. Think of this mix as a cross between Departure and Supercruise. Get ready for the climb of your life, and as always thanks for your support. Enjoy! BPM 132-140 Tracklist: 1. Half Light feat. Tania Zygar (Original Mix Edit) - TyDi 2. Illuminous (Original Mix) - Jonathan Martin 3. Syncope (Original Mix) - Tom Porcell 4. Crowd Control (Original Mix) - Des McMahon 5. Now Or Never (Dan Stone Remix) - Sean Truby 6. These Silent Hearts (Extended Version) - Armin Van Buuren & BT 7. Tears In The Rain (Alex M.O.R.P.H. B2b & Woody Van Eyden Remix) - Will Holland & Yana Kay 8. Synaesthesia (Alex M.O.R.P.H. Remix) - The Thrillseekers 9. Supersonic Clouds (Original Mix) - Anthony Uder 10. Into The Sea (Original Mix) - Redstar 11. Nardo (Jorn Van Deynhoven Mix) - Jorn Van Deynhoven & Manuel Le Saux 12. Together We Rise (Running Man Remix) - Mansel Scheffel

item.title: Departure
item.description: [PROGRESSIVE TRANCE] After many months of design work, it became apparent that Departure was going to be one of the most solidly structured sets that I have done in this particular genre. Incorporating female vocal tracks all throughout the set really made this mix come alive, and set it apart from previously released material (hence the name "Departure"). As in all of my work, I cannot stress enough how important it is to me to keep the flow of music progressing accurately as the tracks blend and transfer into the next song. Departure brings all of this together in a neatly wrapped package of trance and progressive music that sounds more like one complete dream, instead of many separate ones. BPM 124-130 Tracklist: 1. Platform 11b - Intro 2. Heaven Is Falling Down - Luca Lombardi & Remix By Miika Kuisma 3. Talamanca (Original Mix) - Dan Martin 4. Going Around (Proff Vocal Mix) - Solid Sky & Jama 5. Trapeze (Arty Remix) - Static Blue & Ferry Tayle 6. This Night feat. Audrey Gallagher (Arty Remix) - Filo & Peri 7. They Need Us (Original Mix) - Arnej 8. Lights Over Jarvis (Soren Andrews Remix) - Christian Drost 9. Medina (Original Mix) - Redban 10. Imprisoned feat. Emma Lock (Original Mix) - Shogun 11. Lost feat. Zara (Club Mix) - Sunlounger 12. The Evening Sky (Original Mix) - Mark Dub

item.title: Paradigm Shift II (Part 2)
item.description: [PSY TRANCE] Like in the first Paradigm Shift series, part 2 is designed to be much faster and more intense by using tracks with BPM levels ranging from 138-145, a full 10 BPM faster than part 1. This obviously moves the Psy music into an entirely different sound, and with a linear build in BPM as the mix progresses, the intense (some might say it's borderline insanity) and agressive nature of this set becomes clear. BTW, it helps to have a MONSTER sound system to acheive the full effect of this mix. Have at it! Tracklist: 1. Upstream (Sonic Species Remix) - Protonica 2. Skywalker (Original Mix) - Mindwave 3. Drowning Depression (Original Mix) - Psynina 4. Elements (Original Mix) - XI 5. Raca (Original Mix) - Burn In Noise 6. Hentai (Original Mix) - Jharu & Apnea 7. DNA (Original Mix) - Charasmatix & Naveen 8. Essence (Original Mix) - Ital 9. The Reckoning (Original Mix) - Amd 10. Interstellar Matrix (Original Mix) - Psynina 11. Anger In Heaven (Original Mix) - Psynina 12. The Rise Of The Overman (Original Mix) - Atma

item.title: Battle Zone
item.description: [NU SKOOL BREAKS] Heavily inspired by the movie "Step Up 3", this past Spring I started to collect tracks that I thought would work well for a dance movie soundtrack. The result is a continuous mix filled with cutting edge sounds and some of the best Nu Skool tracks available. This Epic adventure has tons of fun, hard hitting songs, that all work together as one, creating a cinematic battling breakbeat experience worth checking out. You've just been served!! Tracklist: 1. Intro - Future Funk Squad & Glen Nicholls 2. Origin (Plastic Shell Remix) - Retroid 3. Revolve - Hedflux 4. Isolate feat. Melody Klyman (Eshericks Remix) - Future Funk Squad & The Crystal Method 5. Break (Original Mix) - Affinity 6. Come Again (Original Mix) - Agent K 7. Dilema (Plastic Shell Remix) - Pilot 8. Tough Case (Original Mix) - Psure & Psyan 9. Bass Addict (Original Mix) - Agent K 10. Underground (DJ Hook Remix) - Citizens Of The Empire 11. Midway (Controllers Remix) - Bartdon 12. Hip Hop Dont Stop (Agent K Remix) - The Klubbheads 13. Computer Machines (Agent K & J-Break Remix) - Rob Real 14. Open Up Your Soul (Wutam & J-Break Remix) - Agent K 15. Freaktrain (Original Mix) - Agent K & Deuce 16. My Way (Original Mix) - Eddie Voyager 17. Body Slam (Original Mix) - Mr. Dan & Sparks

item.title: Supercruise - 2012 Revision
item.description: [EPIC TRANCE] Undergoing a small revision for 2012, "Supercruise" has been shortened to a mix length of 75 minutes, along with some extremely small transitional tweaks. Other than that, "Supercruise" combines the best high energy tracks and uplifting powerhouse anthems that today's trance has to offer. At 75 minutes in length, it makes for the perfect peak hour dance mix to get your party rockin'! Tracklist: 1. Air Raid Siren - Sound FX 2. If Youre Not Here feat. Marcie (Jason Van Wyks Drifting Mix) - Pierre Pienaar 3. Spread (Original Mix) - Right Face 4. Infinite Shores (Stonevalley Mix) - Scylla & Karybde 5. Pacific Waves (Original Extended Mix) - Veselin Tasev 6. The Mind (Activa Remix) - John Dopping 7. Modern Day Madness (Original Mix) - Tom Colontonio 8. On A Mission (Original Mix) - SoundLift 9. Tears Of Hope (Aly & Fila Mix) - Deems 10. Infinity (Neo Kekkonen Remix) - Yves Deruyter 11. Broken (Original Mix) - John O'Callaghan 12. Dont Look Back (Sly One & Jurrane Remix) - John O'Callaghan

item.title: There Is Always Hope
item.description: [PROGRESSIVE TRANCE] When it comes to story building, there is no better genre suited to match my style of mixing than Progressive Trance. The finished product of "There Is Always Hope" has great organic flow, and includes a good balance of moving vocal tracks, as well as uplifting grooving ones. Keeping the BPM's floating in the low to mid 130's is just the right pace to keep the flow of this set moving all the way to the end. Thanks for your support! Comments welcome. Tracklist: 1. Heaven Is Falling Down (M Cecci Remix) - Luca Lombardi 2. Piano In The Rain (Probspot Vocal Mix) - Insignia 3. Unreleased Gems Part 3 (Original Mix) - Dale Anderson & Keenan 4. Always On My Mind (Cordonnier Remix) - Colonial One & Isa Bell 5. Find Yourself feat. Sarah Howells (Original Mix) - John O'Callaghan 6. One Night In Tokyo (Above & Beyond Remix) - Purple Mood 7. Staring At The Sea (Original Mix) - DJ Eco & Pacheco 8. Loveless feat. Vokiida Project (Original Mix) - Evan London 9. Another Way (Original Mix) - Impulsive Drive 10. High Tension (Envio Remix) - Sasha Da Link 11. Overjoyed (Hydroid Remix) - Solarsun

item.title: Duck 'N' Cover
item.description: [HARDDANCE/TECHNO] Love it or hate it, Hard Dance is definitely the most aggressive trance on the market, couple that with Hard Techno, and you've got a recipe for one mind blowing set. Relentless in delivery with incredible bass rhythms and melodic undertones, "Duck 'N' Cover" starts off at 145 BPM and steadily climbs all the way to an eye popping 160 BPM. So, if your into the harder side of trance, get ready to Duck 'N' Cover!!! Tracklist: 1. Energise (Original Mix) - James Lawson 2. Beaver Express (Captain Tinrib Remix) - Max Alien 3. Subsonic (Original Mix) - Omega 3 4. Miloude (Jody 6 Remix) - RR Fierce 5. Fake It (Original Mix) - Ben Fraser 6. Attack Of The 50 Foot DJ (Original Mix) - Sol Ray & Captain Tinrib 7. The Gateway feat. Butcherboy & Captain Tinrib (Original Mix) - Omega 3 8. Dinosaur (Destroyer Remix) - Robert Fabian 9. Pursuit Of Life (Original Mix) - FL-X 10. Top Class (Original Mix) - Destroyer 11. Nightmare (Mental Crush Remix) - Kree 12. Alarm (Original Mix) - Foncek 13. Happy Ending (Original Mix) - Lukas O

item.title: Paradigm Shift II (Part 1)
item.description: [PROGRESSIVE PSY] Starting off 2012 with a bang, the Paradigm Shift series is back with tons of new Psy tracks to enjoy. Following the same format as the previous two-parter, Paradigm Shift II's first part is Progressive Psy with a BPM range from 127-135, and is designed with minimal key changes to give added depth to the transitions between tracks. Tracklist: 1. Intro - Psynina 2. Sparta (Original Mix) - Squared Curves 3. Sweet Things (System 7 Remix) - Liquid Soul 4. Altitude feat. E-Clip (Original Mix) - Flegma & Nerso 5. Antilazing (Original Mix) - Nok & Kopel 6. 28 Days (Original Mix) - Philter 7. Simplicity (Original Mix) - Invisible Reality 8. Without Night (Original Mix) - Flegma & Nerso 9. Observation (Flegma & Nerso Remix) - Suntree 10. Heart Beat (Original Mix) - 4 Play 11. Feathers (Original Mix) - Squared Curves
item.dc:creator: DJ Eclypse

item.title: Computer Generated
item.description: [NU SKOOL BREAKS] Seemlessly blending old and nu skool sounds, "Computer Generated" brings you nearly 80 minutes of today's best high energy breakbeat tracks all in one continuous mix. Built to generate momentum over the span of the set, the mix starts at 130BPM and ends at 138BPM. B-Boyz & Girlz, this one's for you. Enjoy! Tracklist: 1. Byrdkick feat. Arabyrd (Original Mix) - Son Of Kick 2. Ginnie (Under This Remix) - T.R.O. 3. Acid Reign (LuQas Remix) - Robosapiens 4. Nu Style Two (Original Mix) - DJ Rasco & Perfect Kombo 5. Baby Make A Sound (Original Mix) - Agent K & Deuce 6. Funkie Musik (Turns Me On) - Agent K & Deuce 7. Zones (4Kuba Remix) - Future Funk Squad 8. What You Think (Original Mix) - Lunar Shift 9. Somber Siren (Original Mix) - Dom Almond 10. Baby Baby Baby (SLIP 187 Remix) - Bella 11. Looking At You (Original Mix) - Agent K & Deuce 12. XTC (Agent K & Deuce Remix) - Kyper 13. I Will Set You Free (Original Mix) - Agent K & Deuce 14. Sinista (Original Mix) - Agent K & Deuce 15. Bass Binz Slamm (Original Mix) - Agent K & 303

item.title: Planet Hunter
item.description: [PSY-TRANCE] This is a progressive Psy set with a build in BPM from 137-145. Utilizing cinematic & space age sounding tracks, this deeply mixed and well integrated set will take you deep inside the music for an experience like no other. Tracklist: 1. Xone (Original Mix) - Centrino 2. Vibration Of Peace (Original Mix) - Ovnimoon 3. Relativity (Original Mix) - M-Theory 4. Angel Of My Soul (Allaby Remix) - The Egg 5. Induced (Original Mix) - Dickster & Burn In Noise 6. Necrastate Pattern (Original Mix) - Psynina 7. Airflow (Live Edit) - Protonica 8. Lost Transmission (Original Mix) - Sonic Species 9. Amore & Psyche (Original Mix) - Corona 10. Galaxy (Psynina Remix) - Psynina & Intersys 11. Who Are You (Original Mix) - Materia 12. D.I.M (Original Mix) - U-Recken

item.title: Castles
item.description: [TRANCE/PROGRESSIVE] "Castles", my first Trance & Progressive set in 3 years, brings together an eclectic sound rich with beautiful harmonious melodies and powerful bass rhythms. Building in intensity all throughout the mix, then tapering off towards the end, "Castles" will not disappoint. BPM range: 130-135 Comments are welcome! Enjoy! Tracklist: 1. Waves On The Beach (Intro) - Sound FX 2. Musa Bella - Phynn 3. For You (The Blizzard Remix) - Envio 4. Sunrise (Jens Lonnberg Remix) - Andre Visior & Kay Stone 5. Blossom (Arty Remix) - Mike Foyle & Statica 6. Sonic Dive (Moein Remix) - Indecent Noise & Colin James 7. Digital Influence (Original Mix) - The Graff 8. Brazilia (Illitheas Progressive Remix) - Pattraxx 9. Sunrose (Original Mix) - Jessus 10. Gettin' High With Me (TraDeus Tentramade Remix) - Sceleton & Aneym 11. Minerva (Elevation Remix) - Supuer 12. Ever After (Original Mix) - Tucandeo 13. Flying (Nathyn Red Remix) - Leon 78

item.title: Until My Last Breath
item.description: [PROGRESSIVE BREAKS] This mix is part of my Progressive Breaks series. Until My Last Breath uses cinematic and melodic style breaks with a progressive build in BPM from beginning to end, and although this mix is not anywhere near high energy, it does carry a powerful and sincere feel throughout the entire set. As always, enjoy! Tracklist: 1. Windowgazing (Original Mix) - Michael Feihstel 2. Lights Of Paradise (Album Mix) - Ilya Mosolov 3. Atmospheres (Trip Mix) - Magnetique 4. Rain Castle (Original Mix) - Evave 5. Lisa (Abdomen Burst 'Organic Chill' Mix) - Jaksa Pavicevic 6. Small Things (Aeron Aether Breaks Remix) - B.O.N.G. 7. Spirals (Original Mix) - Monojoke 8. Black & White (Reconstruction Mix) - UnderThis 9. Pax (Original) - Ilay Mosolov 10. Secret Valley (Westlake Smack Breaks Mix) - Jim Siver 11. Connection (Aeron Aether Remix) - Michael, Levan, & Stiven Rivic 12. Connection (Faskil Progressive Breaks Remix) - Michael, Levan, & Stiven Rivic 13. Drops (Original Mix) - Soundprank

Connection (Aeron Aether Remix) - Michael, Levan, & Stiven Rivic 12. Connection (Faskil Progressive Breaks Remix) - Michael, Levan, & Stiven Rivic 13. Drops (Original Mix) - Soundprank

item.title: Alien Life Force
item.description: [PROGRESSIVE-PSY] On the fence about Psy-Trance? No worries, I'm not a fan of getting too crazy with my tunes either, and with the abundant selections of Psy available, it's very easy to do. This is a Psy set that I capped at around 135 BPM's, and will contain cutting edge sounds that in some regard belong more to the Progressive Trance family. This is definitely one of my best engineered mixes to date, with unbelievably clean transitions and nonstop grooves, it's one worth checking out! Hope you enjoy it! Tracklist: 1. Flegma & Nerso - Evolve (Original Mix) 2. Time In Motion - Audio Gigolo (Original Mix) 3. Protonica - Final Steps (Original Mix) 4. Protonica - Floating Point (Morning Mix) 5. Vibrasphere - Wasteland (Timedrained Remix) 6. Ovnimoon - Sandal Waters (Zyce, Amp & Flegma Remix) 7. Ritmo - Lego Tech (Original Mix) 8. Midimal - Over & Out (Flegma & Nerso Remix) 9. Sunstryk - No Surface (Original Mix) 10. Twinsect - For Outdoor Use Only (Original Mix) 11. Ace Ventura & Lish - The Light (Zen Mechanics Remix)

item.title: MONOLITH
item.description: [PROGRESSIVE BREAKS] It's been 10 long years since I've worked with Progressive Breaks. In fact, it was June of 2000 when I opened for "The Light" (see: Party Rewind - Live @ The Masquerade) during our summer party series with Outerlimits. In this set you'll find mostly new tracks from 2010, all with incredible production quality (props to the artists who have such great talent) that entails the best in atmosheric sounds, orchestration, and rhythm structure. One of my favorite parts of the set, about 50 minutes into the mix, is a slow breakdown track by Faskil that uses a clip from the new Battlestar Galactica series. Enjoy! Tracklist: 1. Vendetta (Ilya Malyuev Baltic Sound Mix) – Chance Jumpers 2. Silk (Bambaat Remix) – Chance Jumpers 3. Everytime feat Kathleen Mitchell (Arthur Deep Remix) - Jono Fernandez 4. Kaivalya (Original Mix) - Elfsong & Aeron Aether 5. Thirst (Original Mix) - Oleg Zubkov 6. Seven Days (Monojoke 'Squared Break' Remix) - Jason Bradberry 7. Ultraviolet (Original 2005 Mix) - Retroid & Bios 8. It Puts Me To Sleep (Prelude Mix) - Faskil 9. Morning After (D's Futurology Mix) - Damien Heck 10. Freedom (Aeron Aether Remix) – Python 11. Abandon (Fretwell Remix) - Aeron Aether

item.title: Paradigm Shift (Part 2)
item.description: [PSY-TRANCE] Starting just a few BPM's higher than where part 1 left off, Paradigm Shift (Part 2) will deliver non-stop Psy-Trance action from beginning to end with a BPM range from 140-147. Just like in part 1, the tracks chosen are to borderline the Trance and Psy-Trance genre, creating an incredible Epic Psy-Trance sensation throughout the entire mix. Buckle up, because this will be one intense ride! Thanks to all my listeners, and enjoy! Tracklist: 1. Intro - Protonica 2. Space Designer - Fatali 3. Clouds - DJ Brainwave 4. Marinus - Bufo 5. Electric Hippy - The Electric Ant & The Commercial Hippy 6. Transparent - Burn In Noise 7. Galactic Family - Amd 8. Terrordactyl - Tristan 9. Turn Off The Light (Ovnimoon's Terra Remix) - Ovnimoon 10. Organica - Ital 11. Frequency Salad - Headroom & Burn In Noise 12. Slightly Turbo - Amd 13. Pop On - Fungus Funk

item.title: Paradigm Shift (Part 1)
item.description: [PROGRESSIVE-PSY]Paradigm Shift (Part 1) is a Psy-Trance mix designed with tracks that have a trance and progressive feel to them. With a BPM range from 130-137, it's a great mix for people who don't quite want to go to the extreme end of the Psy-Trance spectrum, but are craving a more sci-fi trance set. Tracklist: 1. Intro (wind effect) 2. Believe - Flegma & Nerso 3. Surreal - Flegma & Nerso 4. Far Away - Flegma & Nerso 5. Sacred Earth - Ovnimoon 6. Combustion feat. Zyce - Flegma & Nerso 7. Outwards (Visua Remix) - Zen Mechanics & Motion Drive 8. The Visitor - Jirah 9. Leaving Eden - Sunstryk 10. Multizone - Time In Motion 11. Light - Jay Selway 12. Multistop - Ritmo & Nok 13. One Life - Unseen Dimensions Enjoy!

item.title: RECON
item.description: [DEEP/PROGRESSIVE TRANCE] This set contains a mixture of deep, melodic, and progressive trance. Incredibly well constructed, RECON is designed to provoke a wide range of emotion with each passing track, with transitions that won't disturb harmony or rhythmic basslines. From the intro with gentle rain and rolling thunder, to the two way transmissions between a spec ops team and base camp the tone of the set is established and continues for the next 78 minutes. Enjoy the journey! Tracklist: 1. Light Rain Sound w/Effects & Voiceover (Intro) 2. Being (Sterio & McGrath Trojan Remix) - Alex Stealthy 3. Deploring (Original Mix) - Alex Stealthy 4. Osaka (Remix by The Digital Over) - Taylork 5. Orca (Original Mix) – Keenan Gerrard 6. A Call From The Past - Mike Efex 7. Nature (Remix by Castra & Sovve) - Digitalj 8. Generation X – Anton Chernikov 9. The Promise (Remix by Sean Marx) - Kenneth Thomas vs. Airglow 10. Runaway feat. Tiff Lacey (Remix by Mat Zo) - Keenan & Anderson 11. 4 Seasons In 1 Day (Spaghetti Mix) – Store N Forward

item.title: Into The Abyss
item.description: [DEEP/PROGRESSIVE TRANCE] In this set, we will take a journey to the deepest depths of the ocean. Like a soundtrack taken straight out of a documentary about deep sea exploration, this mix will surprise you with each new song. Strategic track selection was key in making sure the songs delivered the correct rhythm and feel. From eerie to fanciful angelic sounds, this mix is an incredible production from beginning to end and every bit on par with my other production mixes like "The Factory" and "Illusions". Hope you enjoy! Tracklist: 1.Aqua Loop – Sound FX 2.Permanent (Original Mix) – Alex Stealthy 3.Velvet Blunderground (Original Mix) – Dan Mangan & Danny Bonnici 4.The Sun Will Shine (Full Moon Mix) – Ohmna 5.Language (Original Mix) – Hammer & Bennett 6.Sublimate (Original Mix) – Steve May 7.Walk With Me feat. Cristina Soto (Original Mix) – Tritonal 8.Daylight (Original Mix) – Funabashi 9.Shana (Plastic Angel & Duderstadt Remix) – Mr. Pit 10.Honeymoon (Funabashi Mix) – Store N Forward 11.Largo (Original Mix) – Markus Schulz & Elevation 12.Your Burning Eyes (Original Mix) – Anton Chernikov
